inclusion.criterion: treated with anticoagulant therapy for at least three months
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: anticoagulant therapy according to current guidelines

inclusion.criterion: signed and dated informed consent available before study procedures
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: signed and dated informed consent of the subject available

exclusion.criterion: NYHA class III or IV chronic heart failure due to left ventricular systolic dysfunction, left ventricular diastolic dysfunction or significant valvular lesions
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severe renal failure (eGFR <15 ml/min) or renal replacement therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: medical or psychological condition that would not permit completion of the study or signing of informed consent, including life expectancy less than six months, or unwillingness to sign informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: non-compliance or inability to adhere to treatment or to the follow-up visits
exclusion.label: not_met
